content:
Q: What is the No Claim Discount (NCD) Protector? How does it work?
A: The NCD protector is an optional benefit and applies only to policyholders of 50% NCD at an additional premium. It will protect your NCD in the event of a first claim during your policy period. If a second claim is made, the normal NCD rules apply and your NCD will be reduced to 20% on your next policy renewal. The protected NCD is not transferable to another insurer. You will need to renew your policy with HL Assurance in order to enjoy this benefit.
questions: What is the purpose of the No Claim Discount (NCD) Protector?
How does the NCD Protector benefit work?
Who is eligible to purchase the NCD Protector?
What happens to the NCD if I make a claim while having the NCD Protector?
Is the NCD Protector benefit applicable after multiple claims?
Can I transfer the NCD Protector benefit if I switch to another insurance company?
What conditions must be met to continue enjoying the benefits of the NCD Protector?
What is the impact on NCD if two claims are made in the policy period with the NCD Protector?
What is the reduction in NCD after the first claim if I do not have the NCD Protector?
What additional cost is associated with adding the NCD Protector to my policy?
